com.wingfoot.wsdl
Class Message

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.wingfoot.wsdl.Message
public class Message
extends java.lang.Object

Message is a collection of parameters. A Message can be used as an input to a service or could be an output from a service. The parameter(s) that constitute the message are called Part.

Constructor Summary
Message(QName qname)
          Creates a Message.
 
Method Summary
 boolean equals(Message message)
          Two Messages are considered equal if their QName (set in the constructor) have the same namespace AND the same localPart.

Constructor Detail

Message

public Message(QName qname)
        throws WSDLException
Creates a Message. The name of the Message is mandatory. The name is mandatory and must be unique amongst all Messages in the WSDL.
Parameters:
qname - the QName of the Message.
Throws:
WSDLException - if the name in the qname is null.
Method Detail

getName

public QName getName()
Returns the name of the message.

setMessagePart

public void setMessagePart(Part part)
                    throws WSDLException
Sets the message part. A Message contains one or more parts. Each part is a parameter to a method or a return data from a method.
Parameters:
part - instance of Part.
Throws:
WSDLException - if the part name is not unique in the Message.

setMessagePart

public void setMessagePart(Part[] part)
                    throws WSDLException
Set the Message parts. This method replaces any previous Part set using the setMessagePart(Part) method.
Throws:
WSDLException - if the part name is not unique in the Message.

getMessagePart

public Part[] getMessagePart()
Returns all Parts for this Message.
Returns:
array of Part.

getMessagePart

public Part getMessagePart(int index)
Returns the Part at the specified index.
Parameters:
index - of the Vector that contains the desired Part (starting from 0).
Returns:
Part the part at the index.

getMessagePartCount

public int getMessagePartCount()
Returns the number of Part in this Message.
Returns:
int the number of Part in the Message; 0 if none.

equals

public boolean equals(Message message)
Two Messages are considered equal if their QName (set in the constructor) have the same namespace AND the same localPart.
Parameters:
message - instance of Message whose QName has to be compared.
Returns:
if the QNames are identical.

toWSDL

public void toWSDL(org.kxml.io.XMLWriter writer)
Converts an instance of Message into a WSDL.
Parameters:
writer - instance of XMLWriter. The WSDL is written to this XMLWriter.
Throws:
IOException - if an error occurs while writing to the writer.
